title: ISic004458. I.Sicily inscription 004458
body:
Facsimile Images

1[.?]ΑΤΥΡ.[..?]
2[.]ΝΘΑΔΕ
3[.....]ΗΣΑΣ
4[---]ΣΥ[---]
[---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Führer-Schultze and controlled against photograph;
  • 1: Ferrua: Σ]ατυρί[κιος
  • 4: Ferrua: τελ]ευ[τᾷ ?

translation

commentary

Ferrua notes the name Saturikios attested at Salemi (NSA 1893: 340). Note that Ferrua misreports the inventory number as 21977.

bibliography

  • Orsi NSA 1902 429 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Ferrua 1989 no.489 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
  • Führer and Schultze 1907 184 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001979
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
